EmailTemplate.subject: Delivering Project Results | Prework and Programme Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to your participation in {!Training_Event}
Programme Dates: {!Training_Event__c.Start_Date__c} - {!Training_Event__c.End_Date__c} at {!Training_Event__c.Location__c}
The goals for this one-day program are to equip project leaders with an understanding of the importance of change management in meeting project objectives and the ability to speak a common language around change.
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Prework Requirements
To maximize your in-programme learning experience, you will need to complete a number of prework tasks. You should allow 1.5 hours to complete.
Set-up your Prosci Portal Access and Prework tasks
You will receive an email shortly from portal@prosci.com with a link to your programme prework in the Prosci Portal as well as access to additional content, resources and tools to support your in-programme learning.
Once in the Prosci portal, click the “Prework” tile. You should see a drop-down menu that says “Prework Tasks”. Prework is due 4 business days before your programme to allow your instructor time to review.
Pre-Learning
Watch the Integrating Change Management and Project Management (2 minutes) video by Tim Creasey to understand how you can drive greater value by integrating the technical side and people side of change. Enjoy this brief Tim Talks: The Prosci ADKAR Model (4 minutes) video to learn about the five building blocks of successful individual change and how the ADKAR Model supports organizational change. Optional - Dig deeper into the why and how of integrating these complementary disciplines in this Project Management and Change Management - An Integrated Approach (1 hour) webinar.
Schedule
The schedule below indicates the time you will be required to be live online.
Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
{!Training_Event__c.Program_Schedule__c}
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training.
What You Need for Success as a Virtual Learner
Your learning experience is very important to us. In the virtual environment, the following will greatly enhance your experience and success:
Uninterrupted time to focus. Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility High-speed internet connection Webcam capable of streaming you by video Audio headset or audio connection with speaker and microphone
You will receive an email a few days before your programme that will include specific information on how to access your session via your virtual meeting link/ID
Our delivery team will be online 15 minutes before the start of class each day. We ask that you join early to confirm that your technology is working.
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com
Best regards,
{!Training_Event__c.OwnerFullName}
Training Coordinator
